text:
First Class Beauty’ experience now at Mumbai Duty Free
Global travel retailer DFS group is all set to launch a month long First Class Beauty campaign at Mumbai Duty Free in Terminal 2 starting October 1 st to October 31 st at the Chatrapati Shivaji International Airport, Mumbai. This travel beauty promotional campaign in Mumbai will be launched post the success of other First Class Beauty ventures successfully organised at various divisions of DFS across the world. This month long event will unveil a series of product launches, product exclusives, events and tutorials from leading skincare and makeup experts in the world’s largest beauty promotional programme.
During the entire campaign, Mumbai Duty Free will introduce an exclusive product programme tailored to the global traveller’s desires. First Class Beauty will feature collection of the best make-up, skincare and fragrances for all the ways you travel. Whether it’s before, during or after take-off, Mumbai Duty Free Beauty advisors along with industry experts will demonstrate how key travel essentials products will suit customers’ needs. Featured events include special offers and rewards for purchases such as the exclusive First Class Beauty travel bag, exclusive brand gifts, complimentary refreshments and guest make-up artist sessions.
In store promotions by brands like Paco Robanne, Clarins, Bvlgari, Davidoff etc. will ensure that the customers are engaged and spoilt for choice, even for their gift with purchase. To ensure customer participation, OPI will offer engaging activity like nail painting. Shop-in-shops of prestigious brands like Chanel, Dior, MAC, Lancome, Clarins, Estee Lauder and L’Oréal etc. will offer complimentary tips treatments and quick makeovers to interested passengers.
Social media fans will also have a chance to win exclusive gift hampers by liking the Mumbai Duty Free Facebook page and sharing a photo of them with a MDF shopping bag. The promotional campaign will not only include beauty and lifestyle, but customers can also indulge themselves as they participate in a chocolate tasting activity where a chocolate brand will let the consumer sample a new variant of chocolate.
Customers prefer to buy their beauty essentials from this store, which is India’s largest beauty floor measuring more than 2100 sq. meters in space, since it offers more than 4000 products in fragrance, cosmetics and skin care from over 54 brands. Further, one can be rest assured of best prices and 100% authenticity of all products. With more than 8000 gifts to be distributed, 50 travel exclusive sets, and 10 new launches – First Class Beauty is sure to be an exclusive experience reserved for the lucky travellers of October. Immerse yourself in the latest tips, trends and innovations and indulge in luxurious treatments and services to elevate your look from head to toe. So if you travelling abroad this October, happiness begins at Mumbai Duty Free.
